alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Miami-Dade County through 345 PM EDT... At 300 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Richmond West, or near The Redland, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coral Gables, The Redland, Kendall, Pinecrest, Homestead Base, Naranja, Princeton, Richmond West, Richmond Heights, Country Walk, Leisure City, Palmetto Bay, Cutler Bay, Zoo Miami, Goulds, West Perrine, The Crossings, The Hammocks, Inlikita and South Miami Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
